page.title: 06BRADWELL PARISH COUNCIL
page.content: One of the main discussions at the moment is about the building of a link road between{Bradwell}and the new {Gt. Yarmouth}by_pass. There are plans for a buffer zone to be built between Gapton Hall industrial estate and a new estate of private houses. This would be a high mound with trees on the top. The new link road would be built through this buffer zone. The parish council are opposed to this plan as residents would be disturbed. The{Gt. Yarmouth}by_pass will provide more debate in the future as an extension is planned to the new road. Two routes have been proposed. One uses the old railway line through {Gorleston}and the other is a longer route around{Bradwell.
